spiritual_sensitivity.preparation: Be grounded, have support, don't start with most intense protocols if new to energy work
spiritual_sensitivity.integration: Journal, rest, process experiences, don't bypass with more water if overwhelmed

_closing.essence: Water is life. Structured water is conscious life. Every cell bathes in water. Upgrade the water, upgrade the whole system.
_closing.truth: You are 70% water. The quality of your water IS the quality of your consciousness, health, vitality.
_closing.practice: Daily structuring (vortex + sound + intention minimum). Blessing water = blessing self. Drink consciousness.
_closing.result: Cellular hydration, biofield coherence, mental clarity, emotional balance, spiritual opening, vitality restoration.
_closing.sacred: Water is the original sacred substance. All traditions knew. Honor water, water honors you.
_closing.simplicity: Advanced technology beautiful. But simple vortex + prayer = profound. Don't wait for perfect setup. Start now.
_closing.gratitude: Thank water. Water responds to gratitude (Emoto proved). Bless it, it blesses you. Reciprocal relationship.
